projects.title: Telematics Device
projects.description: A device created for a corporate to track vehicles, enabling real-time location data transmission to the cloud. It offers the convenience of over-the-air configuration and firmware updates.

projects.title: StreamDiffusion
projects.description: Software solution for effortless audio streaming to SHOUTcast and IceCast servers. Ideal for radio stations seeking seamless broadcasting.

projects.title: OnTracks
projects.description: An iOS app allowing users to plan and track their train journeys on the SNCB/NMBS network, it offers route planning, live tracking, and up-to-date travel information, enhancing the travel experience for commuters and travelers.

projects.title: RotexBelgium
projects.description: Website for a Non-Profit Organization hosting events for Exchange Students in Belgium. The site feature a custom-built CMS designed for seamless event management and easy participant registration.

projects.title: Ticket Management
projects.description: An efficient ticket management system enabling the NPO to effectively manage participant check-ins and event payments.
